== Main Inclusion Report for shared-desktop-ontologies ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/shared-desktop-ontologies]]</nowiki>; Currently in New, will accept into Main temporarily to not block other work.
# ''Rationale:''
** Those are shared desktop ontologies required by upstream with release of KDE 4.4
** Build dependency of kdelibs, kdegraphics and few others to provide semantic search functionality
** 
0. ''Security:''
** Those are just data files, security flaws are extremely unlikely
0. ''Standards compliance''
** Everything is licensed on CC-By or a GPL-compatible BSD variant
** Uses debhelper 7 with the kde debhelper addon
0. ''Dependencies:''
  None
0. ''Maintenance:''
  The packager responsible for this is the Kubuntu Developers team
